thread.title: Local fourth-graders showcase ski history projects | Local News | conwaydailysun.com
thread.title_full: Local fourth-graders showcase ski history projects | Local News | conwaydailysun.com

author: Tom Eastman
title: Local fourth-graders showcase ski history projects | Local News | conwaydailysun.com
text:
CONWAY — Local fourth-grade students shared their “In Martha’s Memory” New England Ski Museum ski history projects at a showcase event held in the library of Mountainside Intermediate School Wednesday afternoon.
“We had 30 to 40 projects, mostly done in small groups by the 110 participating students over the past month,” said NESM Eastern Slope Branch manager Elaine Stockbridge, who was co-coordinator of the annual ski history exercise.
